document_data.title: Weapons
document_data.realm year: The Year of Tigers Curse ([[1374 DR]]){{LJ}}
document_data.Summary: The events of the adventure took place in the Year of Tigers Curse ([[1374 DR]]). The [[spider katanga]] became a threat once again, amassing and filling the rivers flowing from [[Fire Mountain]] with [[poison]]. Two groups of heroes were sent to stop the evil spider creatures - one group to cause a distraction and rescue the recently captured scouting party, and another to venture into the spider katanga lair to kill the Mother of a Thousand Young before she can birth an army.{{Cite living jungle/An Army of One Thousand|1}}
